sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Unclaimed Life Insurance Benefits Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Unclaimed Life Insurance Benefits Act.

sections.heading: Purpose.   This Act shall require recognition of the Revised Uniform Unclaimed Property Act and require the complete and proper disclosure, transparency, and accountability relating to any method of payment for life insurance, annuity, or retained asset agreement death benefits
sections.text: Purpose. This Act shall require recognition of the Revised Uniform Unclaimed Property Act and require the complete and proper disclosure, transparency, and accountability relating to any method of payment for life insurance, annuity, or retained asset agreement death benefits.

sections.heading: Definitions.  As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Revised Uniform Unclaimed Property Act
sections.text: Nothing in this Act shall be construed to amend, modify, or supersede the Revised Uniform Unclaimed Property Act, including the authority of the State Treasurer to examine the records of any person if the State Treasurer has reason to believe that such person

sections.heading: Administrative rules. The Department shall adopt rules to administer and implement this Act, including defining "electronic searchable files" for the purposes of this Act
sections.text: Administrative rules. The Department shall adopt rules to administer and implement this Act, including defining "electronic searchable files" for the purposes of this Act.
